page.title: 17ONE DAY AT MOLD BATHS
page.content: On Saturday 8th June, 1985 I woke up quite late. I watched No. 73{ {(Recreation)}while having breakfast. Then my mum and dad went to Leo's to buy some food. My sister went to see our cousin and I phoned my friend. When my mum and dad came back they said we could go to Mold baths. We had a quick lunch, soup, bread and a packet of crisps and we went to the baths. My dad dropped us at the baths then went home. I bought some goggles for Â£1.90. In the baths there was a big inflatable monster. It was red and yellow and you had to try to climb onto it. When we got out of the baths we went upstairs for something to eat. My dad drove us home then we had chips, pizza and peas for tea. We watched Kenny Everet and I went to bed after Dynasty and I read my books.{
